channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dead & Company to Celebrate Grateful Dead’s 60th Anniversary With San Francisco Concerts
item.description: 🎉 Let's groove, Deadheads! Dead & Company is bringing the party to San Francisco for the Grateful Dead's 60th anniversary! 🌹☠️ #Grateful60 #DeadAndCompany

item.title: Burna Boy Reveals Release Date for New Album, Shares New Song Featuring Travis Scott: Listen
item.description: 🔥 New music alert! 🔥 Burna Boy drops release date for upcoming album and a collab with Travis Scott! Listen now! 🎶 #BurnaBoy #TravisScott #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Former Girlpool Member Avery Tucker Shares Debut Solo Single “Big Drops”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy vibes of Avery Tucker's solo debut "Big Drops"! Let the music take you on a magical journey! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: SZA Looking After Fans By Gifting Tickets, Confiscating Whippets
item.description: 🚀 SZA stuns with fan love: gifting tickets, cracking down on whippets! 🎵💖 #FanLove #SZA #MusicNews

item.title: New Jersey Department Of Health Says Shakira Concertgoers May Have Been Exposed To Measles
item.description: Shake it off, Shakira fans! 🎶 Stay safe and healthy after that concert groove. 💃💉 #HealthFirst #ShakiraConcert 🎤
